Now that you've done all the hard technical work for your project, it's time for the fun part: showing it off! As part of you final project website we'll be creating short videos which showcase your project.

Think of this like an elevator pitch for your project. You'll have a minute to introduce your project and highlight the key features.

## Format

We'll use the classic hero's arc storytelling framework for making your video sticky.
